handlers.description: Execute a simple Lambda Function and expose it as an API
Invoke an API from the AWS API Gateway that is exposing a Lambda function

Directly call the Lambda function that is being exposed by the AWS API Gateway. This shows how the lambda function needs to be built knowing it will be an API because you must access the input parameters from the HTTP request.

data.name: ExposeLambdaAsAPI
data.description: Execute a simple Lambda Function and expose it as an API

display.name: Use Assume Role
display.description: Use for AWS Assume role, default is false

display.name: Role ARN
display.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume

display.name: Role Session Name
display.description: An identifier for the assumed role session

display.name: External ID
display.description: A unique identifier that might be required when you assume a role in another account

display.name: Expiration Duration(secs)
display.description: The duration, in seconds, of the role session. The value can range from 900 seconds (15 minutes) up to the maximum session duration setting for the role

data.name: CallLambdaAPI
data.description: Invoke an API from the AWS API Gateway that is exposing a Lambda function

data.name: CallLambdaAPIFunction
data.description: Directly call the Lambda function that is being exposed by the AWS API Gateway. This shows how the lambda function needs to be built knowing it will be an API because you must access the input parameters from the HTTP request.

display.name: Use Assume Role
display.description: Use for AWS Assume role, default is false

display.name: Role ARN
display.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume

display.name: Role Session Name
display.description: An identifier for the assumed role session

display.name: External ID
display.description: A unique identifier that might be required when you assume a role in another account

display.name: Expiration Duration(secs)
display.description: The duration, in seconds, of the role session. The value can range from 900 seconds (15 minutes) up to the maximum session duration setting for the role
